attest((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes),addr.details: This method is only callable by a registered Portal

params.attestationPayload: the attestation payload to create attestation and register it
params.attester: the account address issuing the attestation

params.account: The address of the token holder

returns._0: The _owner's balance of the attestations on a given attestation ID

params.accounts: The addresses of the attestation holders

returns._0: The _owner's balance of the attestation for a given address (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

params.attestationsPayloads: the attestations payloads to create attestations and register them

params.attestationIds: the list of IDs of the attestations to replace
params.attestationPayloads: the list of attestation payloads to create the new attestations and register them
params.attester: the account address issuing the attestation

params.attestationIds: the IDs of the attestations to revoke

returns._0: true if the attestation is registered, false otherwise
true if the attestations issued by this portal are revocable, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.attestationId: the ID of the attestation to replace
params.attestationPayload: the attestation payload to create the new attestation and register it
params.attester: the account address issuing the attestation

params.attestationId: the ID of the attestation to revoke

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRouter(address).details: Only the registry owner can call this method

attest((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes),addr.notice: Registers an attestation to the AttestationRegistry

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Checks if an address owns a given attestation following ERC-1155

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/attestation pairs following ERC-1155

bulkReplace(bytes32[],(bytes32,uint64,by.notice: Replaces attestations for given identifiers and replaces them with new attestations

bulkRevoke(bytes32[]).notice: Bulk revokes a list of attestations for the given identifiers

getAttestation(bytes32).notice: Gets an attestation by its identifier

isRegistered(bytes32).notice: Checks if an attestation is registered

isRevocable(address).notice: Checks whether a portal issues revocable attestations

replace(bytes32,(bytes32,uint64,bytes,by.notice: Replaces an attestation for the given identifier and replaces it with a new attestation

revoke(bytes32).notice: Revokes an attestation for a given identifier

updateRouter(address).notice: Changes the address for the Router

@notice Error thrown when an attestation data field is empty
@notice Error thrown when an attempt is made to bulk replace with mismatched parameter array lengths
@notice Error thrown when an attempt is made to revoke an attestation that was already revoked
@notice Error thrown when an attempt is made to revoke an attestation based on a non-revocable schema
